name: Planet Hero (sikgames)
description:
This is my first ever game jam that I participated.

I have a lot of fun making this short game and learned a lot of things. Hopefully, I could improve this game in the near future and add new levels and challenges.

Have fun and enjoy playing this game.

Use "WASD" to control the Player and "Space" to "Jump".

PS. I haven't tested the Mac and Linux export since I don't have a machine to test it, not sure if it will run or not, please help to test it if you have time and leave a feedback in the comment section.
